description:
Quickly pressing Ctrl + C + C, and the utility will immediately and automatically process the clipboard contents.

This is a small utility that can quickly process the current contents of the system clipboard. After selecting the content, quickly press Ctrl + C + C, and this small tool will immediately automatically process the clipboard contents. It can easily export the clipboard content to images, TXT, Word and PDF files, calculate mathematical expressions and display colors in the clipboard in real-time.
